subject: Attention my dear beneficiar
body:
Attention my dear beneficiary I'm Mr  Jeffrey Thompson the president
of bank of America . I'm here to inform you about your unpaid fund
worth of 30 million dollars by ATM card and consignment box, your ATM
card contain 10 million dollars while your consignment box contains 20
million dollars.
This is to let you know that everything guiding your fund fund has
been declared and you fund is very legitimate and genuine therefore
you will receive your fund immediately today
You have to choose any delivery method of your choice below and follow
the instructions for easily delivery .
(1) DHL courier company delivery charges ($150)
(2) FedEx courier deliver company charges ($250)
(3) UPS courier delivery company charges ($300)
(4) Arimax courier delivery company charges ($350)
Best regards Mr jeffrey Thompson
You have to follow up my instructions by paying this payment so that
it can able us proceed with your delivery to your provided information
immediately with out any delay of your time
I'm expecting to hear from you as soon as possible

subject: Re:   Attention my dear beneficiar
body:
Hello Mr. Jeffrey Thompson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this unpaid fund worth millions of dollars. Could you please provide more details about how this came to be? 

Also, could you explain a bit more about the delivery methods and their charges? It would be helpful if you could break down the costs associated with each courier company.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sharon
